channel.title: CVE Feed for Perfmatters -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Perfmatters -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47874|2024-08-02T21:16:43.714Z -- perfmatters -- perfmatters
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Perfmatters.This issue affects Perfmatters: from n/a through 2.1.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-47876|2024-08-02T21:16:43.802Z -- perfmatters -- perfmatters
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Perfmatters allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Perfmatters: from n/a through 2.1.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-47877|2024-08-02T21:16:43.622Z -- perfmatters -- perfmatters
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Perfmatters allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Perfmatters: from n/a before 2.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-47875|2024-08-02T21:16:44.022Z -- perfmatters -- perfmatters
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Perfmatters allows Cross Site Request Forgery.This issue affects Perfmatters: from n/a through 2.1.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-47874|2024-02-29T05:31:09.730Z -- perfmatters -- perfmatters
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Perfmatters.This issue affects Perfmatters: from n/a through 2.1.6.
